name: Oxygene Project File
summary: Learn about .OXYGENE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OXYGENE projects are created with the Oxygene extension, which is available for Microsoft Visual Studio and Delphi IDEs.

description: Project file created with Oxygene, a programming language and multi-platform software development environment; saved using XML formatting and contains software dependencies, references to source code files, and project build settings.
